title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Student-Centered Science Education Design for Exploring New Religious Movements

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can analyze the social context of new religious movements using scientific research methodologies.
Learners can write an argumentative essay critically reinterpreting the binary classification of "cult" and "religion."
Participants can visualize religious text data using digital humanities tools (e.g., text mining).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
